c1.name: Flower of Eden
c1.descriptionRaw: Transient Blossoms generated by Albedo's <color=#FFD780FF>Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma</color> regenerate 1.2 Energy for Albedo.
c1.description: Transient Blossoms generated by Albedo's Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma regenerate 1.2 Energy for Albedo.

c2.name: Opening of Phanerozoic
c2.descriptionRaw:
Transient Blossoms generated by <color=#FFD780FF>Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma</color> grant Albedo Fatal Reckoning for 30s:
路Unleashing <color=#FFD780FF>Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide</color> consumes all stacks of Fatal Reckoning. Each stack of Fatal Reckoning consumed increases the DMG dealt by Fatal Blossoms and Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide's burst DMG by 30% of Albedo's DEF.
路This effect stacks up to 4 times.
c2.description:
Transient Blossoms generated by Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma grant Albedo Fatal Reckoning for 30s:
路Unleashing Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide consumes all stacks of Fatal Reckoning. Each stack of Fatal Reckoning consumed increases the DMG dealt by Fatal Blossoms and Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide's burst DMG by 30% of Albedo's DEF.
路This effect stacks up to 4 times.

c3.name: Grace of Helios
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Descent of Divinity
c4.descriptionRaw: Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field have their Plunging Attack DMG increased by 30%.
c4.description: Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field have their Plunging Attack DMG increased by 30%.

c5.name: Tide of Hadean
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Dust of Purification
c6.descriptionRaw: Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field who are protected by a shield created by Crystallize have their DMG increased by 17%.
c6.description: Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field who are protected by a shield created by Crystallize have their DMG increased by 17%.
